xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dba:db-replace
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare %rest:GET %rest:path("/dba/db-replace") %rest:query-param("name", "{$name}") %rest:query-param("resource", "{$resource}") %rest:query-param("error", "{$error}") %output:method("html") function dba:db-replace($name as xs:string, $resource as xs:string, $error as xs:string?) as element(html)
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:body:
function dba:db-replace( $name as xs:string, $resource as xs:string, $error as xs:string? ) as element(html) { html:wrap(map { 'header': ($dba:CAT, $name), 'error': $error },

{ html:link('Databases', $dba:CAT), ' » ', html:link($name, $dba:SUB, map { 'name': $name }), ' » ', html:link($resource, $dba:SUB, map { 'name': $name, 'resource': $resource }), ' » ', html:button('db-replace', 'Replace') }

{ html:focus('file') }
) }
